input: How to Find the Nearest Casino5
output:
Visit the following URL on your Internet browser: http://www.pokerhouse.co.uk/landbasedcasinos.html.
Click the link that applies to your location.
Determine the distance from your location to each casino.Choose the casino that is the shortest distance from your location.
